message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets in the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" there is a line item called "Purchase of Fixed Assets" which represents the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment.

The value for "Purchase of Fixed Assets" is 0.00 dated 2024-02-05.

Since the company did not spend any money on acquiring property, plant and equipment during this period, the value is 0.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '0.00'}}
```
